message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a highly valuable product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that you won't find a better deal elsewhere.

I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget, and I need to make sure I'm getting the best deal possible.
